text:
With the exact cause of Malayalam actor Kalabhavan Mani’s death still eluding investigating officers, Kerala DGP T.P. Senkumar on Friday said a scientific probe was needed to unravel the mystery.

“The investigation is going on in the right direction. There is no need to come to any conclusion hurriedly. We need to go about it in a scientific manner,” the DGP told reporters here after holding talks with officers on the progress of the case. — PTI
title: ‘Probe into Mani’s death proceeding in right direction’
